text:
July 28, 1959
Mr. Harold £. Wlgren
Educational Television Consultant
Division of Audio-Visual Instruction
1201 Sixteenth Street, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Harold:
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming NAEB
Network offering, I thought you might be interested in what the nation’s
educational radio network is doing. I also thought you might have
particular interest in the programs listed on pages 9, 10, 13, 14, 19,
20, 23, 39, 41, 44, 45, 52, and 53.
Sincerely,
hjssrs
Harry J. Skomla
Executive Director
